name: Spear Snail's Stamp Crimes
description: Spear Snail was separated from his family when he was young, and he had to do illegal thing in order to survive. Having just escaped from prison, Spear Snail's only objective is to get back to his long-lost family by any means necessary. Help Spear Snail through the post office and past the security guards to steel the stamps that he needs in order to make ship himself back to his family.
